> <OLD>
>
> Tucson holds Vestige and bravely walks out of the car, and
> to=
ward the sound of Rodimus's voice.
>
> "I'M HERE RODIMUS, KEEP CALLING TO M=
E, I'LL FIND YOU! IF
> YOUR EYES HAVE FAILED YOU, REMEMBER, YOU STILL HAVE
=
> YOUR OTHER SENSES!"

<NEW>

There was no answer comming from Rodimus save=
 for the sound of buzzing
insects, there were near and approaching as Tusco=
n moved as best he
could along the corridores and tunnels.

The area here w=
as built like any transit system he was familiar with,
with long corridores=
, and signs clearly showing the directions to get
to one place or another. =
However it would seem that the lack of
maintainance was taking its toll as =
in some places the lights were dim
or shut off completely due to lack of po=
wer or quite simply the bulbs
had blown out.


> <OLD>
>
> While in the dar=
kness of the tunnels, Tucson could hear a faint voice recalling Perceptor's=
 words which were typed in on the computer. He knew he had to send a messag=
e back to Perceptor to let him know that he was still all right, and well o=
n his way to finding Rodimus. So he looks ahead, and wispers his reply whic=
h can also be heard in the lab.
>
> " I will find him and I will bring him =
to saftey. No Autobot abandons his comrades."

<NEW>

In the tunnels ahead =
Tuscon is able to find a communication link as
they are seemingly spread ou=
t for convientient use of all who need it,
or atleast it would be convienie=
nt if there was someone around to
actually use it.

However as Tuscon close=
d the line he could hear the sound of matallic
scraping sounding very much =
the same as the sound the spider like
insects made that he had met on the s=
treet. The sound was comming from
further up the hall. The echo and reverb =
along the corridores made it
it difficult to locate true positioning, but o=
ne thing was for certain
it was getting louder, they were closing quickly o=
n his location.

In his arms Vestige coughed, it would seem that he was tak=
ing a turn
for the worst. he would need time in a repair chamber.

(TAG)

P=
reston
